item.title: [317]Need help Random Theiving stalls
item.dc:creator: @amt amt
item.description:
@amt wrote:

My errors idk why it broke

public static int gems [] = { 1617, 1619, 1621, 1623, 1631};

    public static int randomgems()
    {
        return seeds[(int)(Math.random()*gems.length)];
    }

if(objectID == 2562 && playerLevel[17] >= 80){ //-----ppl will need 80 thieving before they can thief the stall.
addItem(Item.randomgems(), 1);;
}else {
sendMessage(“you gotta have 80 thieving before you can thief this stall”);
}

item.title: [317]Need help Random Theiving stalls
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

Its my task to help people with delta

So here it is :

First of all open item.java search for partyhats than u should see somthing like this :

[code]public static int Partyhats [] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048, 1050, 1053, 1055, 1057 };

    public static int randomPartyhats()
    {
        return Partyhats[(int)(Math.random()*Partyhats.length)];
    }[/code]

Now to make your own int make it like this :

[code]public static int seeds [] = { Here will come all your seed ids};

    public static int randomseeds()
    {
        return seeds[(int)(Math.random()*seeds.length)];
    }[/code]

add that under partyhats

close it and open client.java

add this under your object clicking :

if(objectID == Your stall ID){ addItem(Item.randomseeds(), 1);; }

if you wantto add a level req it should look like this :

if(objectID == Your stall ID && playerLevel[17] >= 50){ //-----ppl will need 50 thieving before they can thief the stall. addItem(Item.randomseeds(), 1);; }else { sendMessage("you gotta have 50 thieving before you can thief this stall"); }

Any more question just ask it in this thread i will be checking evry 15 min

Aintaro

Read full topic
